I completed the last chapter of Spiderman 2 ("The First Day of the Rest of Your Life"), in which the only mission is to get 50,000 points, last night. After completing the chapter requirements, you go to the really final chapter, "The Second Day of the Rest of Your Life", which can be considered the post-story-mode section of the game. This chapter has no required missions, but the final upgrade is unlocked, so what you do is just go around fighting crime (to get enough points to buy that upgrade) and getting the rest of the awards and secrets. Oh, and the game IS still fun at that point. This game may have started out as just another GTA imitator, but it has turned out to be a unique classic.
